resources:
CommCare Reminders Default Notifications to remind on the pending tasks "We don't have required permissions to fetch data from CommCare. Please give app the permissions by going into app settings. " "We don't have notification permissions to post notification for CommCare. Please give app the permissions by going into app settings. " We need you to grant permission to read the case data from CommCare in order to fetch reminders from CommCare and remind you time to time on your pending tasks. We need you to grant permission to read the case data from CommCare in order to fetch reminders from CommCare and remind you time to time on your pending tasks. Also we need notification permission to post notification for the Reminders application. We need permission to schedule Alarms to be able to remind you of your tasks OK Permission Required No reminders scheduled Permissions Permission denied by application. Read data from CommCare for fetching reminders from CommCare Permission Grant Permission
Following permission not granted by user : \n- Storage \n- Notification Youâ€™re all set! Reminders will be created once you log into your CommCare application You can also enable the permission from the application setting. Just click on \"Go To Settings\" to open the application setting page. Close Go To Settings Note In case the permission is completely denied, then go to application setting to enable the permission. Request Permission
